title: Looking to the Stars (Encore)
description:
Under these late summer skies, it seems right to revisit Nikki’s conversation with astronaut Cady Coleman about her amazing adventure living and working on the International Space Station… Taking off in… 3… 2… 1…

Tell us what’s making you smile! Send a voice memo to smile@wondery.com 

Our theme song is “Smile” by Ryan Innes
